column2: "Heheheh... How does it feel, as you stare into the abyss? What do you see, though your sight has barely wandered beyond the threshold."
"As you gaze long into it, do you feel yourself embracing the darkness? Do you have the guts to make the crossing...?"

"Throw away, if you dare, your last faint glimmer of hope, and enter the realm...
...of the Phantom."
